You will get a refund via the original payment method.

Unlocked secure element successfully. Reboot your device.
"Looks like you've transferred cards recently. Transfer your transit card to this device?"
After opening the QR code of the bank card, you can display the QR code payment to the merchant.

This item will be topped up automatically

This item will no longer be topped up automatically

Be always ready for your next trip

be associated with your bank account.

The Mi Pay card can be used normally only after the SMS verification is completed. You can also continue to complete the verification later in the card list. If the verification is not completed within 24 hours after adding the card, it will not be verified again
BEIJING MUNICIPAL ADMINISTRATION & COMMUNICATION CARD CO., LTD
Enter balance amount to receive a warning

" Switch the card city to the current location city %1$s to enhance the card experience"
"Looks like you're in %1$s now. Set %2$s as default card?"
No cards in stock now. Stay tuned!
It takes about 1 minute to issue the card…
Use your device anywhere you would use your transportation card. 100 CNY has been added to your account. You can start using Mi Transit card right away!
Use your device anywhere you would use your transportation card. Top up anywhere, anytime.
"This card isn't supported. Try a different card."
According to current location,there is no recommended traffic card.

"1. Mi Transit doesn't support refunds for service fees and card balance.
2. You can still use Mi Transit even after flashing your device, performing a factory reset, and signing out of your account.
3. If you switch phones, you should add a Mi Transit card again. Transferring cards between devices will be supported soon."
"You've already completed the payment using the card %1$s. Bring the card close to your phone's NFC reader to record info."
Swipe the card again to get the latest info
"You've already completed the payment. Bring the card close to your phone's NFC reader to record info."
Multiply top up amount by 10 first
If this is your first time topping up %1$s, you need to add at least %2$s CNY.
Top up amount must be more than %1$d CNY
%1$s will be authorized to get your phone number in order to carry out customer services
This card is different with the previous one. Continue anyway?
"Don't move the card away from your phone while topping up…"
This promotion event has already ended.

The balance of the traffic card is stored in the mobile phone’s security chip and is not tied to the Mi account; if your card supports card transfer, please move the card operation out before changing your mobile phone, and then log in to the card opening ID on the device that supports the card. You can continue to use it after entering. In addition, if the device is lost, it is impossible to report the loss or recover the balance, please understand.
"System service isn't available. Wait a minute or two and try again later"

"The verification code is directly issued by the card company in the mobile phone number you fill in, please confirm: 1, the mobile phone short message service is normal 2, please check whether the short message is blocked by the mobile phone security software"
Recording data now. Keep the card close to your phone.
"Your card type doesn't support this feature."
If the city that you locate supprots transport union card,you could issue Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei interconnection card.
The card information cannot be confirmed without logging into Xiaomi account
The following cards will be cancelled and deleted
Moving your transport card to the cloud...

1.When clearing data, the transportation card will be moved out to the cloud by default, and you can choose to move it in in the wallet-transportation card.Other cards will be cancelled and deleted, and cannot be restored after deletion.

2.You can also skip the clearing. The card information such as the transportation card, door card, MiPay and other cards you have opened cannot be cleared. It will be restored after you start your phone and log in to the same account next time.
The following cards will be moved to the cloud
Ensure to open the QR Pay
The card has been created successfully. In order to improve the card security and card swiping experience, you need to verify your physical card again and write more card data. Please verify.

The card has been successfully created. In order to improve the card safety and card swiping experience, your physical card will be verified again after about %1$s time. Please pay attention to the notification of card status change.
"No card detected! Please confirm whether the card is attached or whether the card is NFC card"
The physical card you used this time is not the same as the physical card you used for the first time. Please use the same card to read the card.
Please retry due to move fast.
Network error, please check network and retry.
Select the card you need, otherwise you can choose the blank card
Please attach the card you just used to the NFC sensor area on the back of the phone again
The contents of the card are not read, select Simulate Card Number Only to simulate the physical ID of the card; Selecting continue will read more card content to increase the swipe success rate.
Card read failed, please reattach the card to NFC induction area for card read.
Swipe your phone can open the door easily
Emulate entity card to your phone
Add virtual card online to your phone
Update to enjoy a better experience of using the card.
"You can update more card's data after %1$s to improve an experience of using the card."
To improve the card safety, please attach the physical card you use to the NFC sensor area on the back of the phone again
The card has been read and more physical card information is being written for you...
Validating card information, please do not move the card

string.name: double_press_power_guide_subtitle
string.Data: <font color=#9B9B9B>Double pressing the Power button will open</font> <font color=#FF7700>Mi Wallet</font><font color=#9B9B9B> now. You can change this in Settings > Button and gesture shortcuts.</font>

resources.string: Double press the Power button to open Mi Wallet
You have to verify your fingerprint to use card keys

string.name: entrance_card_cancel_finger_msg
string.Data:
"From now on, you should use your card keys without fingerprint verification.
If you disagree, you won't be able to use your card keys and have to delete them."

Please ensure that the account entered is your own and valid. This account will be provided to the card service provider for the refund of the balance in your card. If the account is not your own or there is an error, you will not be able to receive the refund of the balance in your card normally
In the card,Do not exit the page…

"1. Alipay Account View method: Open the Alipay APP- My - click avatar - Alipay account 2. Please make sure the account is valid 3. This account information will be provided to the card service provider for your card balance refund 4. The balance of the card will be returned to the account you used to recharge the card within 3 working days. If the refund fails, the account you used to recharge the card will be returned to the Alipay account you filled in on the current page."

"1. After the card is returned successfully, the card will be deleted and cannot be restored 2. According to the card management policy of the transportation card company, the service fee of card opening will not be refunded 3. Please make sure your card is in good condition and the train has left the station, otherwise the card will not be refunded"

"About Smart Switch: 1、Smart Switch do not support cards that require identity verification 2、Smart Switch supports the car key by default"
To open the smart card, the swipe position of the door card should be set

Card range refers to the area of the current card used by default. Use a range loop to generate CARDS centered on your selected location and set the range as the radius. The maximum setting range is %1$d meters and the minimum is %2$d meters.
The range can be set to %1$dm to %2$dm
The card will be swiped by default. Please try to avoid bus stops

"1、In order to improve the credit card experience, please set the precise location of your credit card, for example: East Gate of XX Community 2、When selecting a location, avoid bus and subway stations as much as possible"
In order to improve the credit card experience, please set the precise location of your credit card, for example: East Gate of XX Community
The mobile phone is the door card, the key, you can open the door with the touch of it
The mobile phone is the bank card, you can pay by swiping the mobile phone
All unsaved settings will be lost. Discard changes?
Set time overlaps with another custom time period. Set time again.
"Start time can't be later than end time. Set time again."
Set this card as default? Previous settings will be discarded.

No setup required, automatic support for smart card selection
Smartly select the card for swiping according to the card reader and location
Please set at least 1 door card swipe position
Use this feature when wireless readers are placed on horizontal surfaces or when you hold your device in landscape orientation.

The card with the user-defined time period turned on is still effective, and no card will be recalled in the rest of the time

The repair process may take up to 1 minute. Please keep the network open. Do not exit the page or restart the phone during the repair.
Problem repair is not complete, if there is any problem, please contact Xiaomi Wallet official customer service
Attempt to repair Mi Pay, Xiaomi Bus, Xiaomi Card service during the use of the card disappeared, payment failed to recharge successfully, and the bus card was removed and removed.
Do not exit the page while the problem is fixed...
The problem is fixed. If there is any problem, please contact Xiaomi Wallet official customer service
To improve the success rate of problem repair, you can choose to perform the following operations during the repair process:
When opening, double-click the home key after unlocking to directly call up the card using page

Double click the phone power button to call up the card using page directly
